outline:
1. darkness, cloud, thicket
    1. dark cloud
    2. cloud mass
    3. thicket (as refuge)
kjv_def: clay, (thick) cloud, [idiom] thick, thicket. Compare H5672 (עֲבִי).
strongs_def: properly, an envelope, i.e. darkness (or density, 2 Chronicles 4:17); specifically, a (scud) cloud; also a copse
